About me: I am a 13 year old coder that started learning java for about 2 months. I really enjoy coding especially when the code works. And I am very pround of this website becaues it is the first that I ever programed.

instructions: For this game all you have to do is to point the mouse to where you want the fish to go and then you try to hit the ball using the fish all the way to the finish line and once the ball hits the finish line then you win!
